channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: b4ebc951-a0c2-41f7-a3cd-a57fe27c8e3a
Display name: Reservations Contributor
Description: Lets you read and manage reservations but cannot delegate reservation-related roles
Link: https://management.azure.com/b4ebc951-a0c2-41f7-a3cd-a57fe27c8e3a?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 76153a9e-0edb-49bc-8e01-93c47e6b5180
Display name: DevOps Infrastructure Contributor Role
Description: Read, write, delete and perform actions on Managed DevOps Pools
Link: https://management.azure.com/76153a9e-0edb-49bc-8e01-93c47e6b5180?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 4c6569b6-f23e-4295-9b90-bd4cc4ff3292
Display name: DevCenter Owner
Description: Provides access to manage all Microsoft.DevCenter resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/4c6569b6-f23e-4295-9b90-bd4cc4ff3292?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ‚ùå REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 054126f8-9a2b-4f1c-a9ad-eca461f08466
Display name: Media Services Account Administrator
Description: Create, read, modify, and delete Media Services accounts; read-only access to other Media Services resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/054126f8-9a2b-4f1c-a9ad-eca461f08466?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ‚ùå REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 532bc159-b25e-42c0-969e-a1d439f60d77
Display name: Media Services Live Events Administrator
Description: Create, read, modify, and delete Live Events, Assets, Asset Filters, and Streaming Locators; read-only access to other Media Services resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/532bc159-b25e-42c0-969e-a1d439f60d77?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ‚ùå REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: e4395492-1534-4db2-bedf-88c14621589c
Display name: Media Services Media Operator
Description: Create, read, modify, and delete Assets, Asset Filters, Streaming Locators, and Jobs; read-only access to other Media Services resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/e4395492-1534-4db2-bedf-88c14621589c?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ‚ùå REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: c4bba371-dacd-4a26-b320-7250bca963ae
Display name: Media Services Policy Administrator
Description: Create, read, modify, and delete Account Filters, Streaming Policies, Content Key Policies, and Transforms; read-only access to other Media Services resources. Cannot create Jobs, Assets or Streaming resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/c4bba371-dacd-4a26-b320-7250bca963ae?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ‚ùå REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 99dba123-b5fe-44d5-874c-ced7199a5804
Display name: Media Services Streaming Endpoints Administrator
Description: Create, read, modify, and delete Streaming Endpoints; read-only access to other Media Services resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/99dba123-b5fe-44d5-874c-ced7199a5804?api-version=2022-04-01
